channel.title: Tips for running Obachan Panic?
channel.description: Have any of you run (or played) Obachan Panic? I'd love to hear your thoughts, advice, best practices, etc. I'm going to GM this for a local group in a couple weeks and I'm stoked to finally to get it to the table. The group will be a pretty even mix of rpg veterans and newbies. Thanks!

item.title: Tips for running Obachan Panic?
item.dc:creator: @Jesse_Larimer
item.description:
@Jesse_Larimer wrote:

Have any of you run (or played) Obachan Panic? I’d love to hear your thoughts, advice, best practices, etc. I’m going to GM this for a local group in a couple weeks and I’m stoked to finally to get it to the table. The group will be a pretty even mix of rpg veterans and newbies. Thanks!
